FuncDef: This command enabled access to LUDB for PPPoE and PPPoEoA v4and v6 hosts under the capture SAP. The name of this LUDB must match the name of the LUDB configured under theconfig>service>vprn/ies>sub-if>grp-if>pppoehierarchy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the local user database, up to 256 characters.
